<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="">3c9513e43760711054411a7488a82513</macroponent><name>handle_facet_click</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({api, event, imports, helpers}) {
		const props = api.context.props;
    helpers.navigate.to('search', {
			searchTerm: props.searchTerm,
			searchContextConfigId: props.searchContextConfigId
    },
		{
			searchFilters: props.searchFilters,
			facetFilters: event.payload.selectedFilters,
			disableSpellCheck: props.disableSpellCheck
		});
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-06 09:38:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>ac95dfa40f6071106ad3d755777661e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_facet_click</sys_name><sys_package display_value="KS Investment Requests" source="x_557984_ks_inve_0">3fe2f4c097a031102d7ebf56f053af5a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="KS Investment Requests">3fe2f4c097a031102d7ebf56f053af5a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_ac95dfa40f6071106ad3d755777661e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-06 09:38:04</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
